comment.author: 92807080@N00
comment._content:
Looks like the card reads "Mr's Stites Miller's"
150 years later,  most Americans are still fuzzy about when to add apostrophes, and where. 
.
.

comment.author: 97537068@N00
comment._content: I was thinking the same thing! I always think of everyone being generally more educated back then, but apparently... not in apostrophes! (Or, apostrophe's, ha ha).

comment.author: 99278405@N04
comment._content: We will upload images of some of our pictorial lettersheets soon. You'll see that they are full of charming Gold Rush Era typos, misspellings, and punctuation errors.
